location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General, Public Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The first words of each line of the letter have been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the Bushire Residency accounts and requests an invoice for the military stores returned to India on board the Eliza.The letter also includes a copy of a letter from Francis Warden to John Kaye, 27 June 1816, explaining adjustments to the accounts of the Bushire Residency, which in turn encloses an extract from the Territorial Books for the Bushire Residency 1815-16.
